title: ADB Approves $50M Grant to Boost Green Jobs and Economic Resilience in Tajikistan
description: The Asian Development Bank (ADB) has approved a $50 million grant to help Tajikistan strengthen its reform agenda and accelerate the transition toward a greener, more resilient, and inclusive economy. The funding—implemented under Subprogram 2 of the Enabling Climate-Responsive Business Environment ...

title: Tajikistan rations power as dry autumn hits hydroelectric plants
description: Tajikistan has imposed restrictions on energy consumption, including for some industrial users, because of low water levels at hydroelectric power plants, authorities in the Central Asian country announced this week. The economy ministry told Reuters that electricity consumers representing almost 20...
